definition.name: Input
definition.purpose: Reusable styled input field for forms and user input
definition.description: A React component that renders a styled <input> element with consistent design, focus, and accessibility states. Accepts all standard input props and allows custom class names for further styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the input

type.description: The type of the input (e.g., text, password, email, etc.)

enabled: Input field is enabled unless disabled prop is set

when.description: User types in the input field

from.state: Input is empty or has previous value

effects: Input value is updated in the component's state or parent form

visible: Input field with focus ring and border color change
Input field with reduced opacity and disabled cursor

definition.visualLayout: A single-line input field styled with rounded borders, padding, and focus/invalid/disabled states.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses a utility function 'cn' to merge class names and applies accessibility and state-based styles. Accepts all native input props via React.ComponentProps<'input'>.
